query:
SELECT 
  source,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  MIN(DATE(startDate)) as earliest_start,
  MAX(DATE(endDate)) as latest_end
FROM standardized_events
GROUP BY source
ORDER BY source;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user XDitxHfNNmk4atg.root --database JQrfdruCyxS49XrmnYUv4K --execute

  source,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  MIN(DATE(startDate)) as earliest_start,
  MAX(DATE(endDate)) as latest_end
FROM standardized_events

ORDER BY source;
